alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:00PM CDT until July 05 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EMMET...NORTHWESTERN WEBSTER...POCAHONTAS...NORTHERN SAC... WESTERN KOSSUTH...NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...WESTERN HUMBOLDT AND PALO ALTO COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Five Island Lake to near Pocahontas to 9 miles northwest of North Twin Lake to 6 miles northeast of Sac City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Estherville, Emmetsburg, Sac City, Pocahontas, Rockwell City, Manson, Laurens, Swan Lake, Five Island Lake, Ingham Lake, Iowa Lake, North Twin Lake, High Lake, Lost Island Lake, South Twin Lake, Okamanpedan Lake, Silver Lake, Rush Lake, Armstrong and Graettinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
